::Lavacons/Sickle::

       Astral and Fenox wanted to help the Maximals ag=
ainst obliterttron.

     Astral and Fenox flew over to a hidden area.

   =
 Astral reported in his com back to the others at the Bahamas, "Griplash, S=
tarlight, Recklessa, come to a Maximal base in Tibet now.  We've made a tru=
ce with the Maximals, and it looks like they need help against a 45 foot ta=
ll enemy!!" He screamed.

      They waited their for half an hour, and the=
 others quickly arrived, Recklessa was the only other one who could fly in =
bot mode, so Starlight flew in beast mode, and Griplash was on Recklessa's =
back.

     After arriving, Astral and Fenox lead them to where Oblitertron=
 and everyone was.

      Astral and Fenox were in the air, and Recklessa, =
Starlight and Griplash on the ground, weapons ready.

     Astral used his =
scanners.  Oblitertron.

    "Oblitertron, I am Admiral Astral of the Lavac=
ons.  This is Vice Admiral Fenox, and this is my crew, Recklessa, Griplash =
and Starlight," He said, and then motioned for Fenox to speak.

      "Obli=
tertron, we've established an alliance with these Maximals, and their enemi=
es are our enemies as of now.  Under the orders of the Admiral, and for the=
 Maximals, we demand that you hand over the Maximal's you've taken captive,=
 and surrender.  If you do not comply, then, prepare to fight!!" Fenox said=
, motioning down towards the others, telling them to be ready.
~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Sickle floated around in a loop, an=
d then spoke.

      "Tests???  On me????  Very well, but, please don't hur=
t me," It said.
